Freedman, praises the policies of Teddy Kolleck, who served as mayor of Jerusalem from 1966 to 1993, and notes that Sharkansky's analysis 'lays out-with greater clarity and conciseness than many others who have written on this subject-the problems facing anyone who seeks to govern Jerusalem'.
